name: Summon Night: Swordcraft Story 2
description: Summon Night: Swordcraft Story 2 (サモンナイト クラフトソード物語2, Samon Naito Kurafutosōdo Monogatari 2) is an action role-playing game by Banpresto for the Nintendo Game Boy Advance system. It is part of the Summon Night series of games and the sequel to Summon Night: Swordcraft Story. Atlus handled the English translation of the game.
